La cuenta oficial en Twitter de Cyberpunk 2077, Con motivo de su tweet 2077,...
caption:
#Cyberpunk2077 celebra su tweet número 2077

La cuenta oficial en Twitter de Cyberpunk 2077, Con motivo de su tweet 2077, enviaron un mensaje a los fanáticos, agradeciéndoles por su apoyo, hablando sobre la comunicación con la comunidad y también brevemente sobre el juego en sí. 188 more words

title: Cyberpunk 2077, el por qué de la vista en primera persona
body:
Cyberpunk 2077, el por qué de la vista en primera persona

En un nuevo tráiler, CD Projekt red habla de los motivos por los cuales Cyberpunk 2077 cuenta con una vista en primera persona, en contraste con la saga de The Witcher, así como los retos que esto implicó.  (more…)

summary: El desarrollo de Cyberpunk 2077 tiene para rato
title: El desarrollo de Cyberpunk 2077 tiene para rato
excerpt: Dentro de los comentarios realizados por los trabajadores de CD Projekt, se sobrepone uno: el del narrador, indicando que el título se encuentra en una etapa lejos de su final.

tags: I'm sorry I can't really write in English
summary:
eric-coldfire
 replied to your chat  “Me, finally watching Cyberpunk 2077 presentation from E3 2018: God, I...”
                ...
body:
eric-coldfire replied to your chat “Me, finally watching Cyberpunk 2077 presentation from E3 2018: God, I…”
I think you can look up the PC requirements for the demo pretty easily, and use that as an estimate for what the final build could be like.

The only thing I found caused me an episode of the-thing-we-call-depression-while-joking (my English vocabulary is too poor for that), but then I don’t really need high/uber details on 4K resolution and 60 fps (the thing they supposedly used was a MONSTER), so I can’t estimate anything for sure.

When Cyberpunk comes up, my laptop will be at least two years old and it wasn’t the best thing you could find on the market when I was buying it. It was the best for me, considering my requirements and budget, but still. Two-year-old equipment is old, especially for gaming.

summary:
Cyberpunk 2077 Video Claims Development is ‘Far from Over’ 

While fans are awaiting the return of Cyberpunk 2077 at this year’s...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077 Video Claims Development is ‘Far from Over’

While fans are awaiting the return of Cyberpunk 2077 at this year’s E3, PlayStation has released a new behind-the-scenes documentary for the in-development first-person sci-fi title. 

Go look!

summary: Go Behind The Scenes Of The Making Of "CYBERPUNK 2077"
title: Go Behind The Scenes Of The Making Of "CYBERPUNK 2077"
body:
Go Behind The Scenes Of The Making Of “CYBERPUNK 2077”

PlayStation goes behind the scenes with CD Projekt Red to bring you an exclusive look at their ambitious upcoming project, Cyberpunk 2077.

Cyberpunk 2077 is an upcoming role-playing video game developed and published by CD Projekt, releasing for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. Adapted from the 1988 tabletop…

summary: Heya I decided this funky, classy V had a mullet and used to be a guitarist (rockerboy!) she quit the music world though, but...
body:
Heya I decided this funky, classy V had a mullet and used to be a guitarist (rockerboy!) she quit the music world though, but kept her strong beliefs and philosophy.

Little is actually known about her outside of her musical past. There was some drama a few years back that involved the death of her vocal partner, which lead V to quickly leave music in her past. She then signed up with her friend Jackie to become a mercenary and has been making money that way ever since!

@shipthedame here’s more about my V! Nothing’s set in stone yet but I’m getting there :,-)

summary: ‘The Witcher 3’ director has joined ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ as design director. Is this good? I don’t know, I’m fucking worried about...
caption:
‘The Witcher 3’ director has joined ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ as design director. Is this good?

I don’t know, I’m fucking worried about Cyberpunk 2077. Maybe I shouldn’t be. But, it’s been in development forever, and we don’t know shit. So, is the Witcher 3 director joining just adding dope talent? Or, is it a sign of troubled waters? Someone help me interpret this.

Keep Reading »

blog.name: worldofdarkness-eyecandy
blog.title: RPG Eyecandy
blog.description: I use this place to share my love for World of Darkness games: Vampire the Masquerade, Mage the Ascension, Demon the Fallen, Werewolf the Apocalypse, Hunter the Reckoning, Changeling the Dreaming and Wraith the Oblivion (Ok I throw in some Cyberpunk here and there but who can blame me!?) I am an avid collector of pictures that inspire scenes, themes and potentially characters, whether they're for my personal use, for someone else's or for NPC's used to run scenes for players. Enjoy and hopefully you'll find a thing or three that inspires you!
